Package org.apache.sling.api

Interface SlingHttpServletResponse

All Superinterfaces:
Adaptable, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse, javax.servlet.ServletResponse
All Known Subinterfaces:
SlingHttpServletResponseResult
All Known Implementing Classes:
HeadServletResponse, JspSlingHttpServletResponseWrapper, OnDemandWriterResponse, PrintWriterResponseWrapper, SlingHttpServletResponseWrapper, SlingServletResponseAdapter
@ProviderType public interface SlingHttpServletResponse extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse, Adaptable
The SlingHttpServletResponse defines the interface to assist a servlet in creating and sending a response to the client.

This interface is currently empty and merely exists to parallel the SlingHttpServletRequest interface.

Starting with Sling API 2.0.6, this interface also extends the Adaptable interface.
